availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Tosh. Father of George W. Tosh, Daniel Tosh, Nancy Tosh, Andrew J. Tosh, Martha Tosh, and Pitts Tosh. Married to Gabriella Tosh. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 303B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Fredonia, p. 179.
"William Tosh (1803-1865)," Find A Grave, Memorial #25737469, accessed April 27, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25737469.
